data.actual_result: It allows you to scroll up forever which shouldn't happen
data.expected_result: When you try to scroll if it doesn't allow you to and sets you back
data.short_description: You can scroll up forever if the keyboard is opened at the beginning of a chat
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord and start a new conversation with a new user or scroll up to the beginning of an existing conversation - Open the keyboard and scroll up
